Ever had troubles with an element that's "stuck" under other elements, even though it has the highest z-index in the DOM? Ever had problems troubleshooting layered elements using CSS? 
Trouble no more! Come to this session to learn about z-index and how to use it to layer the DOM to your will. We will cover two important concepts in layering DOM elements: stacking context and stacking order. We will also cover how z-index affects stacking context and stacking order. You will walk away with a new-found appreciation for z-index's powers, and tips for troubleshooting CSS layering problems.
